Your Primus 1000 / 2000 cockpit was the greatest back in the day, but now those days are past. The Primus Elite DU-875 liquid crystal display upgrade delivers brighter, clearer, higher resolution images, and 2X the reliability of your old, obsolete DU-870 CRTs. The upgrade is an easy “plug and play” replacement that can be done in less than a day.Right now, StandardAero is offering customers $5,000 off their Primus Elite upgrade, in addition to Honeywell trade-in credits of $35,000 per DU-870 unit. This is a potential savings of up to $180,000, but hurry - the Honeywell trade-in credit offer expires on 6/30/2019.
Contact StandardAero to learn more or request a quote.
